title: Valley of Barossa
creator_contributor_role: South Australian Government Tourist Bureau, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Barossa Valley (S. Aust.)
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/South Australia - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/South Australia - Social life and customs
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Wine and wine making
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Wine and wine making
description: Barossa Valley, often described as Australia's "Valley of the vine" is one of South Australia's most attractive beauty spots. Against a background of vineyards and wineries, the various seasonal activities are featured and highlights from the biennial Barossa Valley Vintage Festival presented. Commentary by Peter Ross.
